enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination-48
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#No hepatitis A primary series dose was administered-131

ValueSet-IMMZD2DTHepatitisAInactivatedHA.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD2DTHepatitisAInactivatedHAV1Dose ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD2DTHepatitisAInactivatedHAV1DoseVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
